effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 560,883.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,410, further increased by 896 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
